quotes: dinner in New York City in November,
In May 2012, she was a co-chair, alongside Anna Wintour, for the 2012 Met Ball Gala themed Schiaparelli and Prada: Impossible Conversations.
In 2013, she also starred in Joel and Ethan Coen's black comedy Inside Llewyn Davis alongside Oscar Isaac, and Justin Timberlake.

In 2014, she returned to the stage, starring in the London revival of the David Hare play Skylight with Bill Nighy and Matthew Beard, directed by Stephen Daldry, at Wyndham's Theatre in London's West End.
She followed the production when it transferred to Broadway at the John Golden Theatre in April 2015.
2015–2019: Critical acclaim
In 2015, Mulligan starred in Thomas Vinterberg's film adaptation of Thomas Hardy's novel Far from the Madding Crowd with Matthias Schoenaerts, Tom Sturridge, and Michael Sheen,
In the fall of that year she starred in Sarah Gavron's Suffragette (2015) with Helena

quotes: In 2014, she returned to the stage, starring in the London revival of the David Hare play Skylight with Bill Nighy and Matthew Beard, directed by Stephen Daldry, at Wyndham's Theatre in London's West End.

organizations.name: Evening Standard Theatre Award
quotes: It won the 2014 Evening Standard Theatre Award for Revival of the Year and was nominated for the 2014 Olivier Award for Best Revival.

quotes: It won the 2014 Evening Standard Theatre Award for Revival of the Year and was nominated for the 2014 Olivier Award for Best Revival.

organizations.name: Variety
quotes: Marilyn Stasio of Variety declaring that the two central performances left the audience 'breathless — and wondering how they can sustain this level of emotional intensity throughout the show’s 13-week Broadway run.'

organizations.name: Tony Award
quotes: The play won the Tony Award for Best Revival and she earned her first Tony Award nomination for Best Performance by a Leading Actress in a Play.

organizations.name: Toronto International Film Festival
quotes: Mulligan attending the premiere of Wildlife at the 2018 Toronto International Film Festival

organizations.name: IndieWire
quotes: Anne Thompson of IndieWire wrote that her performance 'proves that she can carry a movie' adding, 'Carey Mulligan is excellent: her face has a pinched girlish prettiness combined with a shrewd, slightly schoolmistressy intelligence'.
